King Faisal Naval Base (; ) is a Royal Saudi Navy base located in  Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. It is home to the navy's Western Fleet which operates in the Red Sea, one of the two main formations of the Saudi navy.
The base was used by the United States Air Force after the Iraqi invasion of Kuwait and in the leadup to the subsequent Gulf War of 1991.
See also
* List of things named after Saudi kings
* List of military installations in Saudi Arabia
